categories: Finnish terms derived from Ancient Greek

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English gnome), ultimately from Ancient Greek γνώμη (gnṓmē).

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English Gnostic), ultimately from Ancient Greek γνωστικός (gnōstikós). Has the derivational suffix + -ikko.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English Gnostic), ultimately from Ancient Greek γνωστικός (gnōstikós) and adapted with the adjectival suffix + -inen.

glosses: gnu, wildebeest (antelope of the genus Connochaetes)
black wildebeest, white-tailed gnu, Connochaetes gnou (large antelope native to south Africa)
blue wildebeest, brindled gnu, Connochaetes taurinus (large antelope native to eastern Africa)

words.etymology_text: Borrowed from German Gnu, from Khoekhoe !nu:.
